scenario:
Datadog reported a 26% revenue increase year-over-year to $690 million in Q3 2024, with a forecasted full-year 2024 revenue of $2.66 billion and net income per share at $1.75-$1.77 range. The company has a 11% CAGR in the observability market and a cloud security TAM opportunity. The average DDOG price target is $162.64, with a current price of $138.57 per share.

HubSpot reported 23% year-over-year revenue growth to $2.5 billion in Q3 2024, with a market penetration of 10% and a TAM of $128 billion by 2029. The company completed the acquisition of Frame AI, which will integrate with its Breeze AI agents to provide conversation in natural language. The average HUBS price target is $750.54, with a current price of $703.82 per share.

ServiceNow grew its SaaS subscription revenue by 23% year-over-year to $2.71 billion in Q3 2024, with a subscription renewal rate of 98-99%. The company is scheduled to release its next earnings report on January 29th, with an EPS forecast of $1.77. The average NOW price target is $1,118.63, with a current price of $1,023.17 per share.
